amendment.description: To reduce funds for an Army Aviation Support Facility for the Army National Guard at New Castle, Delaware, and to modify other military construction authorizations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1397 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1397 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8652-8653) To reduce funds for an Army Aviation Support Facility for the Army National Guard at New Castle, Delaware, and to modify other military construction authorizations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1397 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1397 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
